channel.title: Rats [Hacks]
channel.description:
So basically there are these things called "Rats" (im sure most of you have heard of them) You can get them from downloading things to do with rs.
How they hack you: People will hunt you down and be like "Show me your bank" or "Trade 20m+ for my green h'ween?"
These people are considered hackers (imo)
I lost 164m to it (i was pissed lawlz)
So just giving warnings to people out there, watch out for these, if a person seems suspicious don't trade them ;)
Gl with your RuneScaping Adverturererererers

item.title: Rats [Hacks]
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

You obviously have to be infected first, they cannot infect you from a trade in RuneScape, lol. They trade you to target the richest players.

Yes and they could DC you but that doenst mean they can log on your account.

Read full topic

item.title: Rats [Hacks]
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:5, topic:421630”][quote author=[J]ava link=topic=524287.msg3815351#msg3815351 date=1321296515]
I didn’t realize they could do all this from one simple trade, I’m only ever using the Grand Exchange. o-o
[/quote]
ikr? They D.C your client and log onto your account and trade stuffs >.< (cuz if u have a bank pin they can’t get your stuffs :D)[/quote]
You obviously have to be infected first, they cannot infect you from a trade in RuneScape, lol. They trade you to target the richest players.

Read full topic
